remarks: Deduce the unit of a ring from its properties.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2016.)
statement:
rngurd.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
rngurd.p $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .r ` R ) ) $.
rngurd.z $e |- ( ph -> .1. e. B ) $.
rngurd.i $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( .1. .x. x ) = x ) $.
rngurd.j $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( x .x. .1. ) = x ) $.
rngurd $p |- ( ph -> .1. = ( 1r ` R ) ) $.
$d .1. x $.
$d .x. x $.
$d B x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
